426.verse: ۞ وَسَارِعُوٓاْ|And hasten|156|173|3273$إِلَىٰ|to|53|87|118$مَغْفِرَةٍ|forgiveness|95|129|3274$مِّن|from|50|84|53$رَّبِّكُمْ|your Lord|82|116|490$وَجَنَّةٍ|and a Garden -|120|137|3275$عَرْضُهَا|its width|100|108|3276$ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٲتُ|(is like that of) the heavens|206|221|3277$وَٱلْأَرْضُ|and the earth|111|126|3278$أُعِدَّتْ|prepared|78|93|235$لِلْمُتَّقِينَ|for the pious.|109|117|34$

427.verse: ٱلَّذِينَ|Those who|92|100|20$يُنفِقُونَ|spend|83|99|41$فِى|in|48|64|89$ٱلسَّرَّآءِ|[the] ease|90|106|3279$وَٱلضَّرَّآءِ|and (in) the hardship|159|175|1535$وَٱلْكَـٰظِمِينَ|and those who restrain|173|181|3280$ٱلْغَيْظَ|the anger|84|100|3281$وَٱلْعَافِينَ|and those who pardon|168|200|3282$عَنِ|[from]|61|93|1663$ٱلنَّاسِ‌ۗ|the people -|102|134|75$وَٱللَّهُ|and Allah|80|112|167$يُحِبُّ|loves|68|84|1712$ٱلْمُحْسِنِينَ|the good-doers.|127|127|556$

428.verse: وَٱلَّذِينَ|And those|87|103|42$إِذَا|when|55|88|1370$فَعَلُواْ|they did|74|107|3283$فَـٰحِشَةً|immorality|86|119|3284$أَوْ|or|41|74|154$ظَلَمُوٓاْ|wronged|80|113|558$أَنفُسَهُمْ|themselves -|106|122|87$ذَكَرُواْ|they remember|119|129|3285$ٱللَّهَ|Allah|53|73|184$فَٱسْتَغْفَرُواْ|then ask forgiveness|157|177|3286$لِذُنُوبِهِمْ|for their sins -|115|135|3287$وَمَن|and who|76|96|1012$يَغْفِرُ|(can) forgive|106|116|3267$ٱلذُّنُوبَ|the sins|90|101|3288$إِلَّا|except|65|87|86$ٱللَّهُ|Allah?|58|80|123$وَلَمْ|And not|72|94|2566$يُصِرُّواْ|they persist|99|121|3289$عَلَىٰ|on|63|85|52$مَا|what|53|75|262$فَعَلُواْ|they did|74|85|3283$وَهُمْ|while they|88|330|256$يَعْلَمُونَ|know.|92|334|115$

426.verse: And hasten to forgiveness from your Lord and a garden as wide as the heavens and earth, prepared for the righteous

427.verse: Who spend [in the cause of Allah] during ease and hardship and who restrain anger and who pardon the people - and Allah loves the doers of good;

428.verse: And those who, when they commit an immorality or wrong themselves [by transgression], remember Allah and seek forgiveness for their sins - and who can forgive sins except Allah? - and [who] do not persist in what they have done while they know.

429.verse: Those - their reward is forgiveness from their Lord and gardens beneath which rivers flow [in Paradise], wherein they will abide eternally; and excellent is the reward of the [righteous] workers.

430.verse: Similar situations [as yours] have passed on before you, so proceed throughout the earth and observe how was the end of those who denied.

431.verse: This [Qur'an] is a clear statement to [all] the people and a guidance and instruction for those conscious of Allah.

432.verse: So do not weaken and do not grieve, and you will be superior if you are [true] believers.

433.verse: If a wound should touch you - there has already touched the [opposing] people a wound similar to it. And these days [of varying conditions] We alternate among the people so that Allah may make evident those who believe and [may] take to Himself from among you martyrs - and Allah does not like the wrongdoers -
